--- In gladiator@y..., "oldschool518" <johnnyoldschool@e...> wrote:
> i'm tellin you, there is definitely a level in Tevildo's set where 
> the bad guys are at least level 1000. and i'm not talkin about the 
> mage one.

You were sorta right.  There is a scenario with a single character who 
has experience level 1000, but other characters have experience level 
100.  There was a reason I wouldn't remember it: it's "The Ocean 
Without A Boat".  Just for that, I will have to beat that scenario 
with my mega mage.
